attributes.action: stop a new law coming in giving Bailiffs the power to enter houses to seize goods for credit card debts without a court order
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bailiffs could soon be breaking into homes to seize goods for credit card debts without a court order. A new law will leave vulnerable people at risk from 'rogue enforcers'.  Don't let this happen as if this new law passes, the first victim of rougue Bailiffs could be you !!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
